SELECT A.PS_CODE , A.NAME ,B.ps_date ,C.PI_DUTYNAME FROM (SELECT PS_CODE , LISTAGG(MD_NAME,',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY MD_NAME) NAME FROM (SELECT c.PS_CODE,c.MD_NO, B.MD_NAME , c.PRE_DRUG_NUM, c.PRE_DRUG_DAY, c.PRE_DRUG_COUNT FROM PRE_DRUG c, MEDICINE B, PRESCRIPTION a WHERE c.MD_NO = B.MD_NO AND a.PS_CODE = c.PS_CODE AND a.PS_COMPLETE_DATE IS NOT NULL AND a.PATIENT_CODE = #{patientCode} ) GROUP BY PS_CODE) a, PRESCRIPTION B, PHARMACY_INFO C WHERE A.PS_CODE = B.PS_CODE AND C.PI_HPID = B.PHMACY_CODE
AND B.PS_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE-180 AND SYSDATE order by b.ps_date DESC

SELECT count(A.PS_CODE) FROM (SELECT PS_CODE , LISTAGG(MD_NAME,',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY MD_NAME) NAME FROM (SELECT c.PS_CODE,c.MD_NO, B.MD_NAME , c.PRE_DRUG_NUM, c.PRE_DRUG_DAY, c.PRE_DRUG_COUNT FROM PRE_DRUG c, MEDICINE B, PRESCRIPTION a WHERE c.MD_NO = B.MD_NO AND a.PS_CODE = c.PS_CODE AND a.PS_COMPLETE_DATE IS NOT NULL AND a.PATIENT_CODE = #{patientCode} ) GROUP BY PS_CODE) a, PRESCRIPTION B, PHARMACY_INFO C WHERE A.PS_CODE = B.PS_CODE AND C.PI_HPID = B.PHMACY_CODE
AND B.PS_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE-180 AND SYSDATE

SELECT a.md_name ,c.pre_drug_count ,c.pre_drug_day ,c.ps_code ,c.MD_NO ,d.PS_DATE ,e.PI_DUTYNAME ,e.PI_DUTYTEL1 ,d.PHMACY_CODE FROM medicine a ,medicine_info b ,pre_drug c ,prescription d ,PHARMACY_INFO e WHERE d.ps_code = #{psCode} AND a.mi_code = b.mi_code AND a.md_no = c.md_no AND c.ps_code = d.ps_code and e.pi_hpid = d.PHMACY_CODE
SELECT count(a.md_name) FROM medicine a ,medicine_info b ,pre_drug c ,prescription d WHERE d.ps_code = #{psCode} AND a.mi_code = b.mi_code AND a.md_no = c.md_no AND c.ps_code = d.ps_code
